description: The file defines an API router for a FastAPI-based web service managing robot framework test runs. It includes endpoints for starting/stopping runs, retrieving stats, logs, configuration, and managing UI states, along with associated data structures and import statements.

methods.name: RunResponse start_run(payload: RunRequest)
methods.description: Starts a robot run with the provided payload, returning run id, status, and logs path.

methods.name: StopResponse stop_run()
methods.description: Attempts to stop the current robot run.

methods.name: StatsResponse stats(run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id"), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Fetches aggregated statistics for a specific run.

methods.name: CaseStatusResponse case_status(run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id"), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Returns counts for passed, failed, and total cases for a specific run.

methods.name: ProgressResponse progress(run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id"), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Calculates and returns the progress percentage for a run.

methods.name: CurrentCaseInfo current_case_info(run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id"))
methods.description: Retrieves information about the currently executing test case.

methods.name: logs()
methods.description: Streams log data via Server-Sent Events.

methods.name: str batch_log()
methods.description: Returns the entire current batch log content.

methods.name: str fail_log(run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id"), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Returns formatted failure logs for a specific run.

methods.name: ConfigPayload get_config(path: str = Query(..., description="Relative config path from CONFIG_DIR"))
methods.description: Reads a specified config file from the configuration directory.

methods.name: ConfigPayload put_config(payload: ConfigPayload)
methods.description: Writes a given config content to a specified path.

methods.name: ConfigListResponse list_configs()
methods.description: Lists configuration folders under the configuration directory.

methods.name: ui_lock(payload: UILockRequest)
methods.description: Sets or clears the UI lock state.

methods.name: GetStateResponse sync_state_route(payload: SyncStateRequest)
methods.description: Merges provided state into stored UI/application state.

methods.name: ExpectedTotalResponse get_expected_total(run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id"))
methods.description: Returns the expected total test cases for the current run.

methods.name: ExpectedTotalResponse set_expected_total(run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id"), total: int = Query(..., description="Expected total"))
methods.description: Sets the expected total test cases for the current run.

ctags.name: case_status
ctags.pattern: /^def case_status(run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id"), db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -/
ctags.signature: (run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id"), db: Session = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: current_case_info
ctags.pattern: /^def current_case_info(run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id")) -> CurrentCaseInfo:$/

ctags.name: fail_log
ctags.pattern: /^def fail_log(run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id"), db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> s/
ctags.signature: (run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id"), db: Session = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: get_config
ctags.pattern: /^def get_config(path: str = Query(..., description="Relative config path from CONFIG_DIR")) -> Co/
ctags.signature: (path: str = Query(..., description="Relative config path from CONFIG_DIR"))

ctags.name: get_expected_total
ctags.pattern: /^async def get_expected_total(run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id")) -> ExpectedTotalRes/

ctags.name: progress
ctags.pattern: /^def progress(run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id"), db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> P/
ctags.signature: (run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id"), db: Session = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: set_expected_total
ctags.pattern: /^async def set_expected_total(run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id"), total: int = Query(/
ctags.signature: (run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id"), total: int = Query(..., description="Expected total"))

ctags.name: stats
ctags.pattern: /^def stats(run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id"), db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> Stat/
ctags.signature: (run_id: int = Query(..., description="Run id"), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
